des: "My Salvadoran neighbor made this often and we all went wild for it.  Its a wonderfully fresh tasting salsa that can be used as a tortilla chip dip or a topper for steak fish or chicken."
ins: In a medium bowl, combine the radishes, cilantro, tomatoes, onion, salt and red pepper flakes. Stir in lemon juice. Let stand for 15 minutes before serving to blend the flavors.
